input.sentences: the favorite teams were both playing against each other .
there was a lot of press there .
output.sentences: It was another day at the sports arena, and what an exciting day it was.
I watched my favorite team go toe to toe with the enemy team.
During half time, I enjoyed a hot dog while I watched some of the players relax and talk to press.
And when the game resumed, I watched my team lead to victory.
My favorite team was on FIRE.
